}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Contains an [[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (AX200NGW)]] wireless module under the heatsink. {{#set:Probable Linux driver=iwlwifi}}
*[[TP-LINK Archer TX3000E]] - AX3000 Dual Band Wireless PCIe Adapter :Bluetooth 5.0, Two Antennas, PCIe 2.0, Low-Profile Bracket Included <!-- :Amazon: B07G36YQ11 (GB) • EAN: 6935364052256 • [[Intel]] ([https://www.overclockers.co.uk/tp-link-archer-tx3000e-dual-band-wireless-ax3000-wifi-6-bluetooth-5.0-pci-e-adapter-nw-21u-tp.html spec.]) -->
